REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0513 reute b f BC-BANK-OF-ENGLAND-DOES 03-30 0050

TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF ENGLAND DOES NOT OPERATE IN MONEY MARKET
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it had not operated in the money market during the morning session. Earlier, the Bank revised its forecast of the liquidity position to flat from its original estimate of a 100 mln stg surplus. REUTER
